dataIdInfo.idCredit: HIC/Iraq using Landsat imagery & United States National Imagery Mapping Agency (NIMA) source data for modifications. These CODs are referred as as a common geographical reference dataset by IMWG on (21July 2014.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
-Governorate Boundaries â€“ HIC/Iraq using Landsat imagery & United States National Imagery Mapping Agency (NIMA) source data for modifications- with metadata of alterations stored within the Attribute table of the line feature. Consider this CODs as a common geographical reference dataset, rather than a definitive cartographic product.

HRpcode = humanitarianresponse.info pcode. This code can be used to link CODs to HR.info products , this can be used to link to products derived from HR.info such as the assessment registry.

HRname is a copy of admin2 field name for Humanitarianresponse.info

- Changes incorporated in the shape (Iraq_admin1_poly) (aside from the 3 HR columns) are the pcodes and names. The latest pcodes were incorporated in the shape files and some admin names were corrected. (19June2014) New pcode is used and in the absence of authoritative (Government or otherwise) geodata, these CODs are referred as as a common geographical reference dataset (21July 2014)
